description: The G1GC has come a long way since it was first supported in Java 7 update 4. So much so that it will become the default collector in Java 9. In this session will we look at how G1GC works and how to tune it using information from the GC logs. Finally, we'll look at how it performs when used with Cassandra benchmark.
short_description: The G1GC has come a long way since it was first supported in Java 7 update 4. So much so that it will become the default collect
title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Kirk Pepperdine - Using the G1GC
